availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David J. Thomas (Covington carpenter and city assessor)

body.p: Covington carpenter and city assessor. Pennsylvania native. Married Mary W. Matlock Thomas. Father of Eleanor J. Thomas Ferguson, Carolina Thomas, David Thomas, William Thomas, Mary Thomas, Francis Thomas, and Edwin Thomas. Covington city assessor in 1864.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1321. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 269. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 27. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 6. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), 1920, Kenton County, file no. 11862.
